title: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with rich meat sauce.
steps: Cook the spaghetti in boiling water.
Heat olive oil in a pan, sauté onions and garlic.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Pour in tomato sauce and simmer.
Serve the sauce over spaghetti and top with Parmesan cheese.

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: A refreshing salad with grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, and Caesar dressing.
steps: Chop the romaine lettuce.
Grill the chicken until cooked through and slice it.
Toss the lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Top with croutons, grilled chicken, and Parmesan cheese.

title: Pancakes
steps: Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder in a bowl.
Whisk in eggs and milk until smooth.
Heat butter in a pan and pour in batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook the other side.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
steps: Butter one side of each slice of bread.
Place cheese between the unbuttered sides of bread.
Heat a pan and grill the sandwich until the bread is golden and the cheese is melted.

title: Beef Tacos
description: Delicious beef tacos with fresh toppings.
steps: Cook the ground beef with taco seasoning.
Chop lettuce and tomatoes.
Assemble the tacos with beef, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and sour cream.

title: Fruit Smoothie
description: A refreshing and healthy fruit smoothie.
steps: Combine all ingredients in a blender.
Blend until smooth and serve immediately.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Classic cookies filled with chocolate chips.
steps: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Mix flour, sugar, and butter in a bowl.
Stir in eggs, vanilla, and chocolate chips.
Scoop the dough onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

title: Tomato Soup
description: A warm and comforting tomato soup.
steps: Sauté onions and garlic in olive oil.
Add tomatoes and broth, simmer until soft.
Blend the soup until smooth and serve hot.

title: BBQ Chicken Wings
description: Spicy and tangy BBQ chicken wings.
steps: Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F).
Marinate the chicken wings in BBQ sauce, garlic, and paprika.
Bake for 25-30 minutes, basting with more sauce.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: A quick and healthy vegetable stir fry.
steps: Heat oil in a pan and stir fry garlic and ginger.
Add vegetables and cook until tender.
Stir in soy sauce and serve hot.
